appSubtitle: Transform Your Architectural Visions into AI Art Prompts
appDescription: Upload an exterior shot or combine multiple images to craft the perfect AI prompt.
modelConfigTabDesc: Choose your AI provider and model.
multiImagePromptPlaceholder: Describe this part (e.g., 'Use the atmosphere from this image')
choosePathDescription: Analyze your image or find real-world examples for inspiration.
inspirationsDescription: Select a concept to analyze its attributes. Web sources can be visited for more details.
attributesDescription: The AI's suggestions are highlighted below. Click any tag to add or remove it.
rePromptPlaceholder: Describe how you'd like to modify the generated prompt (e.g., 'make it more cinematic, warmer lighting')
copyHint: Click the copy icon, or edit the prompt.
geminiModelHint: For analysis and text generation tasks. Image generation uses 'imagen-4.0-generate-001'.
geminiCreditsDesc: Generating new AI concepts uses credits for the 'imagen-4.0-generate-001' model. The API does not provide a real-time credit balance. To check your current usage and limits, please visit your
apiKeyPlaceholder: Enter your Google AI Studio API key
apiKeyInstructionsTitle: How to Get Your API Key:
apiKeyStep2: Click 'Get API key' in the top-right corner
apiKeyStep3: Create a new API key or use an existing one
apiKeyStep4: Copy and paste your API key here
geminiApiInitError: Failed to initialize Gemini API. Please check your API key and try again.
geminiApiMissingError: Please enter your Google AI Studio API key in the Model Configuration tab.
ollamaImportantNoteDesc: To connect to a local Ollama server, you must configure its CORS settings. Stop your server and restart it using the command for your OS:
ollamaWindowsStep2: Then, on the next line, run:
ollamaFinalHint: This allows the web application to communicate with your local model.
confirmClearAll: Are you sure you want to clear all history?
confirmDeleteHistoryItem: Are you sure you want to delete this image from history?
